conversation.name: Angela
conversation.dialogue: Hey Marcus! I'm doing great. Did you read the book, 'The Power Of Thought', which I suggested you?

conversation.name: Marcus
conversation.dialogue: Yes, I did. That was the most powerful book on thought which I ever read. Thank you for suggesting me, Angela!

conversation.name: Angela
conversation.dialogue: Welcome, Marcus. Yes, indeed I found it too. In the book the author has compared our mind with the garden. But, there was some tough words and sentences that I found it difficult in understanding. Did you get it?

conversation.name: Marcus
conversation.dialogue: Yeah, the sentence was a bit confusin especially when the author compared our mind with garden. Do you know someone to whom we can ask to clear our confusion?

conversation.name: Angela
conversation.dialogue: Well, I was suggested by our literature teacher Mr. James. So, I think he can help us however, I am afraid if he may be not available at the college.

conversation.name: Marcus
conversation.dialogue: We can go to the church then, can't we?

conversation.name: Angela
conversation.dialogue: You are right; he will be available at the church at the evening. So, we can go to the church.

conversation.name: Angela
conversation.dialogue: Hey Marcus! I'm doing great. Did you read the book, 'The Power Of Thought', which I suggested you?
